#define BPATH_TRAVERSE_POINTCACHE (   ptcaches)
Value:
{                                                                          \
        PointCache *cache;                                                     \
        for (cache= (ptcaches).first; cache; cache= cache->next) {              \
            if (cache->flag & PTCACHE_DISK_CACHE) {                             \
                rewrite_path_fixed(cache->path,                                \
                                   visit_cb,                                   \
                                   absbase,                                    \
                                   bpath_user_data);                           \
